Get this crack http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5447296/Command__amp__Conquer_4_Crack___Automated_Patch , it's much easier, then do this.

1. Install the game from this torrent, and crack it with the torrent I linked by following the rest of the steps.
2. To windows 7 users (maybe with vista too) go to %"wind_dir"\System32\drivers\etc find the "hosts" file, go to properties, and UNtick the "read only" checkbox. %"win_dir" is usually C:\Windows (Thanks razielblack13)
3. Put the offline patch in the install folder and run it, not sure if it needs to be there but I did it and it worked.
4. Put all of the other files from the launcher folder that came with this download into the install directory.
5. Run the game, everything should work fine now, but remember to save the game after the start of each mission due to the bugs with the game saving itself (not everyone has these issues). And for everyone who asks, I did confirm it by playing, you don't level up until the end of the fourth mission, because at the end of the third mission you choose a side to be on.

Koraun I followed your steps and I could not run the game. When I try to run the game and click "Play" button then a window appears concerning CNC4SERVER.exe. It says "Command & Conquer 4 Server Emulator ver 0.1a by KoriTama". Do you know where the problem is?

@Ramirez24 That should pop up, but it should start the game too. Try the other patcher that is in the description, I just posted that one because the other one wasn't working for me, and the one I posted was easier. Make sure that all of the files from the launcher folder and the offline patch installer are moved into the play directory with the patch I linked, if you have not done that yet then try that before trying the other patch.
Thanks a lot. It works fine now.
